颰字的基本解释

颰
bá
疾风：“颰排阊阖入紫宫。”

颰
fú
风。

颰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bá］
［《廣韻》蒲撥切，入末，並。］
［《廣韻》方伐切，入月，非。］
(1)疾风。
(2)风疾速貌。

颰字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　颰； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1412第19
【廣韻】【集韻】?蒲撥切，音跋。【玉篇】疾風。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?方伐切，音發。義同。　又【釋典】有阿颰經。　【正字通】本作?。○按字彙誤作颰，非。今攺正。颰字从友作。

颰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
颰字的起名意思

暂无。

颰
Basic explanation of words
颰
bá
Haifeng: "Tai Pai Chang closes into the Purple Palace."
颰
fú
wind.
颰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bá］
["Guang Yun" Pu Bo cut, enter the end, and merge. ]
["Guangyun" Fang cut, enter the month, non. ]
(1) High winds.
(2) The appearance of wind speed.
颰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Feng Zi Department】　颰; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1412 Page 19
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu Zhuo cut, sound postscript. [Jade articles] gust of wind.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fang cut, sound made. The same meaning.　[Explanation of Code] There is Aying Sutra.　【Zhengzitong】This work?. ○According to the vocabulary, it is mistaken as 颰, no I am now. The word 颰 is made by friends.
